sections.summary: i currently have 42 flying hours. iâ am a sophomore student at southwestern illinois college in the aviation pilot program and i am very interested in the aviation world. i have wanted to be a pilot and be around airports and planes since i was eight years old. i am working on my private pilot certificate at ideal aviation. i also work at ideal aviation as a line service technician.â
